source: IRS Revenue Procedure 2024-40; One Big Beautiful Bill Act (signed July 4, 2025)

senior_bonus_deduction.notes: New deduction under One Big Beautiful Bill Act. $6,000 per eligible individual age 65+. Phases out at 6% per dollar over threshold. This is IN ADDITION to the existing additional standard deduction for age 65+.

dependent_limitation.notes: Dependent's standard deduction is the greater of $1,350 or earned income plus $450, but cannot exceed the basic standard deduction for their filing status.

notes: Base amounts increased from Rev. Proc. 2024-40 values ($15,000/$30,000/$22,500) by the One Big Beautiful Bill Act to $15,750/$31,500/$23,625. Additional amounts for age 65+ and blindness are cumulative (both 65+ AND blind = $4,000 for single, $3,200 for married).
